responsibilities: Lead and manage the operational aspects of AI and machine learning projects, ensuring robust and scalable deployment.
Develop and implement strategies for seamless deployment of machine learning models into production environments.
Build and maintain the infrastructure required for efficient data processing, model training, and inference at scale.
Set up and manage monitoring systems to ensure the performance, reliability, and scalability of AI/ML models in production.
Automate the end-to-end machine learning pipeline, including data collection, preprocessing, model training, deployment, and monitoring.
Work closely with data scientists, data engineers, and software engineers to streamline the workflow from development to production.
Ensure that AI/ML systems comply with security standards and best practices, addressing data privacy and protection concerns.
Conduct performance tuning, troubleshooting, and optimization of AI and ML models to improve efficiency and reduce latency.
Evaluate, select, and integrate appropriate tools and frameworks for model training, deployment, and monitoring.
Maintain comprehensive documentation of processes, configurations, and performance metrics of deployed AI/ML models.
Foster a culture of continual improvement by staying updated with the latest advancements in AIML Ops and implementing best practices.
Develop and implement incident response plans to address and mitigate issues with deployed models promptly.
Plan and implement strategies for scaling AI/ML models to handle increased demand and larger datasets.
Proactively propose new solutions and enhancements leveraging AI/ML to address business challenges and improve operational efficiency.
Work with cross-functional teams to incorporate AI/ML insights into broader business strategies and processes.
qualifications: Deep understanding of software development and a broad range of technical capabilities.
Advanced understanding of microservices architecture and best practices.
Experience with serverless computing frameworks and technologies.
Proficiency with hybrid and multi-cloud environments.
Strong background in network architecture and security protocols.
Experience with large-scale data processing frameworks.
Familiarity with software development in agile and scrum environments.
Experience with database management systems, both SQL and NoSQL.
Advanced knowledge of cybersecurity best practices and compliance issues.
Strong project management skills with the ability to manage multiple priorities.
Demonstrated success in automating complex infrastructure and creating self-healing systems.
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills with attention to detail.
Excellent written and verbal communication skills for clear documentation and cross-team collaboration.
Ability to innovate and adapt to rapidly changing technologies and environment.
Ability to earn trust, maintain positive and professional relationships, and contribute to a culture of inclusion.
analysis:
The job responsibilities and skills listed focus on the operational aspects of AI and machine learning projects, including deployment, monitoring, and optimization of AI/ML models. The responsibilities emphasize managing the infrastructure for data processing, model training, and inference, as well as ensuring the performance and scalability of AI/ML models in production. There is a strong focus on AIML Ops, automation of machine learning pipelines, and compliance with security standards.

The skills required include a deep understanding of software development, microservices architecture, serverless computing, and large-scale data processing frameworks. There is also an emphasis on cybersecurity, project management, and the ability to innovate and adapt to changing technologies.

There is no specific mention of Generative AI (GenAI) or language models (LLMs) in the responsibilities or skills. The job seems to be more focused on the operational and infrastructural aspects of AI/ML systems rather than the development or application of GenAI or LLMs.

Therefore, based on the provided information, it does not appear that this job specifically involves working with Generative AI or language models.
